ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed slightly
1 (10 ounce) package frozen strawberries, partially thawed
des: "Bananas, pineapple and strawberries are combined with orange juice concentrate, covered in a simple syrup and frozen for a cool salad."
ins: In a large bowl, mash bananas.  Stir in orange juice concentrate, pineapple and strawberries until well mixed. In a separate bowl, stir sugar into boiling water until dissolved.  Allow to cool slightly, then pour over fruit mixture; stir to coat.  Freeze until cold and just firm.
